title: SWE: Relationship Status
itunes:title: SWE: Relationship Status
itunes:subtitle: Not only is Facebook sucking up all your time, but it is also going to ruin your relationship if it hasn't already. Your relationship status, compromising photos, and lack of cyber affection might contribute to the demise of your relationship. But all...
description:
Not only is Facebook sucking up all your time, but it is also going to ruin your relationship if it hasn't already. Your relationship status, compromising photos, and lack of cyber affection might contribute to the demise of your relationship. But all hope is not lost! Emily tells you how to survive a relationship on Facebook. Please support our sponsors: Max4Men, Masque, and Good Vibrations. Use coupon code Emily25 at checkout for 25% off your purchase at Max4Men. Use coupon code GVEmily20 at checkout for 20% off purchases of $100 or more at Good Vibrations.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
